Generation II.Gold: The scent of spices comes from around its neck. Somehow, sniffing it makes you want to fight.
Generation II.Silver: A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck. The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.
Generation II.Crystal: The scent that wafts from the leaves on its neck causes anyone who smells it to become energetic.
